text: Twoja twarz brzmi znajomo is a Polish reality show broadcast on Polsat. The fourth season premiered on 5 September 2015. Piotr Gąsowski and Maciej Dowbor returned as the hosts. The judges were Paweł Królikowski, Katarzyna Skrzynecka, DJ Adamus and Małgorzata Walewska. ==Contestants== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%; width:70%;" ! Celebrity ! Known for ! Episodes won ! Episodes lost !
